meanings.definition: A name used by one group of people to refer to another group of people or their language.
meanings.sent1: In some cultures, exonyms are used to describe neighboring tribes.
meanings.sent2: Linguists study exonyms to understand cultural interactions.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the exonyms the adults used for their secret club.
meanings.sent4: The exonyms whispered in the wind, carrying tales of distant lands.
meanings.sent5: The colorful exonyms painted a vivid picture of diversity in language.

meanings.definition: A name of a place used by speakers of another language.
meanings.sent1: Tourists often struggle with exonyms when navigating foreign cities.
meanings.sent2: Learning exonyms can help travelers communicate effectively abroad.
meanings.sent3: The exonyms on the map seemed to play hide and seek with the lost explorer.
meanings.sent4: The exonyms echoed through the streets, guiding the wanderer to hidden gems.
meanings.sent5: The exotic exonyms added a touch of mystery to the traveler's journey.
